basic_info.description: 汨 I'm Bhumika Varshney. I have completed B-Tech in year 2012 & later became Certified yoga instructor with an ability to build effective relationships with students of all background and skill levels. I am hardworking, dedicated & supportive with excellent communication & problem solving skills. Thank you 汳

projects.title: Asana Name-1
projects.description: Bhujangasana (Sanskrit: 爨ｭ爭≒､憫､吭･財､伶､ｾ爨ｸ爨ｨ; IAST: Bhuja盪gﾄ《ana) or Cobra Pose is a reclining back-bending asana in hatha yoga and modern yoga as exercise. It is commonly performed in a cycle of asanas in Surya Namaskar (Salute to the Sun) as an alternative to Urdhva Mukha Svanasana (Upwards Dog Pose)
